featured.text: People hoist their glasses 30 they are sitting around ski lodges, sailing, dancing, or enjoying a football game.

definition.zh_def: 滑雪的運動或活動，通常在雪地上進行，使用滑雪板。
definition.en_def: A sport or activity that involves gliding over snow on skis.
definition.example: We decided to ski down the mountain during our winter vacation.
